website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable two-person sofa that hits the sweet spot between traditional and contemporary styling -  neither too streamlined nor too stuffy.
pros: Hardwood and high density foam covered in soft polyester upholstery
Easy to assemble even without tools
Supportive seat constructed with individually-wrapped coils
cons: Stuffing in back cushions may shift
Some customers reported the center support and leg sagged within months

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY, LASTED LESS THAN 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I did extensive research prior to making a purchase, I wish I had done more. I loved this couch when I first got it; it was shipped well, arrived quickly, and was easy to put together. Unfortunately, this item held up for less than six months. I've attached a photo showing how the couch has given out in the center and is now being supported by styrofoam blocks. I thought I could trust a brand name like serta, but all I want is a refund. I can't wait until I have enough money to buy a new couch, and get this one out of my sight.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Inexpensive. Easy to assemble. cozy. Comes with 2 throw pillows. Cushions are vacuumed. So remember to wait before you put on the covers on the cushion. This will make them fluffy. Got a matching rug from Amazon for $40
customer_reviews.author: The Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: The couch looked great however within a week or so
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were excited to get this couch as we live in a third floor apartment and needed a couch that could be assembled in order to fit it through the stairwell. The couch looked great however within a week or so, the middle leg broke. It is only stapled on and it is a very weak support. We ordered another couch and the exact same thing happened. The middle leg buckled under. We were very disappointed with the poor quality of this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Nyakairu

customer_reviews.title: Awful crap
customer_reviews.text: The biggest waste of almost $400. After less than 3 months the leg in the center of the couch totally buckled. The couch was useless until we put three thick books under it. So I informed the seller and they required a picture of the defect (which is fine) and for me to ship it back myself. Terrible product, terrible company, send terrible service. I wish I could give it negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: marcus plant

customer_reviews.title: this is crap and a Childs size loveseat.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, I am into it for $366. I received an email confirming that it would be brought into my home and put where I wanted it. This did not happen I had to help the truck driver open the box and carry the pieces up the stairs. I had to put it together. As you can see from the pictures it is about the quality you would find at a dollar general. IT IS NOT AN ADULT LOVE SEAT!. Th dog sitting on it is 35 lbs. and the pillow is 16 inches. Unfortunately the truck driver took the box so I don't know what I will do to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Tails

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable, not too soft but not too firm, it looks beautiful for the price, it was very easy to assemble, the head of the huge screw that comes with it was broken, but it didn't affect the assembly. I'm very satisfied with my first couch.
customer_reviews.author: belky

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY OVERALL DISSATISFIED  & EVEN WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM ANAZON!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made which I was so disappointed coming from Serta!!! Missing parts so needed to return because no one could supply with parts, very dissatisfied!!! After putting together, one time sit down on it and it’s splitting in the middle!!! No throw pillows came with as pictured! Upon wanting to return it, it took a while ( almost four weeks) just to have the shipment company contact me and for them to pick up for a return. Then amazon never canceled the original carrier UPS pick up for the return. What a total waste of my time on this whole deal!! Never again!!! Found another one better made and not from Serta!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Disposable couch?
customer_reviews.text: This "couch" is so unbelievably cheap. I'd say you get what you pay for, but it's not worth half the $400 I paid. I was trying to find something small to fit in my dad's new assisted living space. I swear it feels like a cardboard frame, the feet are plastic, and the fabric is really uncomfortable and scratchy. The cushions after 72 hours are still all wonky from being compressed. Horrible purchase I regret wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: aramom

customer_reviews.title: Great for small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small nyc apartment where space is limited. Cozy and comfy but want to post a few things to note for others buying this... Throw Pillows shown in image do not come with this loveseat. Back seat cushions are loose and not attached so sometimes when u get up from sitting the back support falls down and you see the base of sofa, looks a little cheap. The dark Gray color is received is more of taupe, which could be a good thing for neutral tone rooms. It plays well with beige items as well as grays. Loveseat is also much lower than expected. Would be great if it was a few inches higher.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: This is truly awful.
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat has 6 legs, which I thought would be great for support; however, the holes were not drilled properly for the center legs which made them taller than the legs on the ends. If you nudged the couch at all it would SPIN on the center legs! They also dented my wood floors. Even if it didn't have this defect I would have hated it. The seat isn't deep enough to sit comfortably and you're going to have to straighten the back cushions every time you get up because they're not attached. Honestly you can get a better quality loveseat for less money at Big Lots. We returned this. I will never by furniture online again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to assemble. However, my couch arrived with a stain in the fabric which was strange. I'll be calling them to double check if they can send a new cover. The couch is surprisingly comfortable and decent for a small apartment. Good first couch. UPDATE: It hasn't even been a year yet, and the fabric is ripping off of the couch and the legs are sideways.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Great couch. I've had it for over 2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Great couch. I've had it for over 2 years now. It was a very large box, and took a bit of figuring-out to assemble. It's pretty sturdy, and moving it to a new apartment was pretty easy. Manageable with one person, even. My only complaint it that because the back support is hollow, it can be a little harder than a solid couch. The size is perfect for smaller apartments and studios, and it doesn't show any visible signs of wear, even though I've had it for a few years now. Very great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pixichik118

customer_reviews.title: Great starter couch!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in one box. I am a 5'3" girl and had to open it outside and bring in the pieces to build inside. Took me 1.5 hours by myself. No tools necessary. Pretty much you screw the two back pieces together, then screw on the legs, then stuff the 4 pillows and you are done. I deducted one star because of its shape. I'm hoping the seat cushions don't stay so pointy! But I like the color. Light beige, almost taupe. Very neutral. Came with brown pillows that I switched out for my own. Soft fabric. Firm cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: This couch works perfectly for our playroom space. It came with two pillows that we aren't using. My husband is over 6ft tall and doesn't fit on the couch comfortably. It's rather low to the ground, but great for kids and those who are petite (5'4" and below). The only negative is that we couldn't place it against a wall. I've included a photo of the backside. This is not a fancy couch and the material is velcroed on. If you pull it taut, it blends in quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Jules in Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Was way too small (should have suspected this since it comes in a box). The actual usable space seemed smaller than the published dimensions. Bought another sofa for the same price at a brick and mortar store which was so much larger and nicer. Good sofa for a tiny person living in a tiny space.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Just terrible
customer_reviews.text: Small, poor quality product. Too heavy to carry a few flights of stairs alone, find some friends to help you with it if you still decide to go with it. Easy to assemble, but 2 days later cushions are down under 120-pound weight (don't even think of buying it if you are heavier than that). Arrived without decorative pillows and was suggested instead to buy pillows with 30% discount. Terrible product, terrible purchase experience. Don't waste your money, cheapest futon at w@11m@rt would serve you better than this loveseat
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in customer as zipper of cushion seat cover was ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality of build is cheap but did not expect too much at price point. Disappointed in customer as zipper of cushion seat cover was broken and was told that it was backordered so I could return item or wait 8 weeks because cushion cover was on backorder. Item too bulky and large to consider returning, but still have not received cushion and company not pressed to get it to me. Would not recommend buying product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with this purchase. First, it got lost during shipping. I don't know how you lose a couch, but Amazon sent me "another one" which I regret. I was hoping to get away with paying for a cheap couch that would "surprise me" with value, but better to spend the money for a quality couch. Which I ended up doing, bigly. The couch has very little depth which gives you the feeling of falling down. The velcro makes sounds when you sit. Overall, not a comfortable couch. Would recommend for someone who wants a cheap couch and never plan on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about it. It was easy to put together and fits perfectly. It’s reasonably comfortable but is a bit short in height- my knees are over my hips and for my hip replacements it’s not a comfortable position to sit through a movie- but I can use the lazy boy for that. It’s comfortable for naps though! Also- I’m not sure how durable the back cushions are but I guess time will tell
customer_reviews.author: KH Tang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: What do you expect for this kind of money? Well, maybe a little better. The instructions for assembly seem to be written by someone in the USA but could have been a little clearer. My main complaint was about the back of the chair where the "fit" of the back could be better. The hook and loop system of velcro needs improvement. I had to buy more to get the bottom of the back to stick down. If it is going to be against the wall you can probably live with it but mine was going to show.
customer_reviews.author: bbcardzetc@aol.com  Clayton Savage

customer_reviews.title: Basic sofa. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's an alright little sofa. It was affordable and has held up under some pretty extreme kids. Does show every little stain and Mark though. Would not recommend this color to anyone. Assembly was strange. It came in peices and basically screwed together. Have never seen anything quite like it. I was able to put together by myself and didn't take that long. I will not be purchasing another though and I feel like if it makes it another year I'll be really suprised. It's seating quality isn't that great either. Not really overly comfortable and kind of an awkward back height.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I had to even give this one star. It’s horrible. When you sit down you sink into the middle. The color is a lot lighter then shown. The pillows that it’s shown with in all the pictures does not come with it. I contacted the seller and was told that they no longer send pillows with the couch. Every time you sit down the Velcro that the cushions are attached to makes a sound where it’s pulling apart. It’s the most uncomfortable couch I’ve ever sat on. Don’t waste your money. It’s trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful couch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this couch looking for an inexpensive option. We haven't found our dream sectional yet so this was our work around until we do. We could not be happier. Shipping was quick! Came in one box and the way it is to assemble takes less than 20 minutes. No tools required. It is extremely comfortable! It sits low to the ground which is great for young children. Definitely worth the price! Product is true to color and the cushion covers do come off the be washed. Overall highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joint Account

customer_reviews.title: Nice but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice sofa and color is excellent my only issue is when you have a sofa delivered cut in half which I didn't know when I ordered this it cuts down on the amount of weight the sofa can hold. I purchased this for my Mom and will do for now but I will have to replace it at some point. For lightweight people or someone who lives alone its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AJ5702

customer_reviews.title: Ok sofa, more of a big love seat
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this sofa for about 8 months and here what I like and dislike about the sofa. Pros: looks awesome, great colors, better in person and comes with two pillows. super comfortable Cons: The sofa feels more of a big love seat. I can fit two people on it, but it will feel tight. Great for couples together. Not good with friends and other people who like space between them. If it was about 6 inches wider and longer. I would give this sofa 5 star approval.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: but I am very happy with this loveseat so far
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few days, but I am very happy with this loveseat so far. The cushions are nice and firm. Assembly was easy and took under an hour. I didn't experience much of a problem with the fumes, but I turned on a fan and opened the windows to air it out. The directions are mostly clear and well-written. The only confusing part was that they stuffed cushions in the back of the chair without explaining that these should be removed. Overall a great deal for the price ($277 when I bought it). Hopefully it holds it's shape and structure over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves the couch and matching love seat and they are super comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this couch! It came in a tiny box and my first thought was "HELL NO... there cannot be a couch in there". This couch was expertly packed and assembly was a breeze (NO TOOLS REQUIRED). Everyone loves the couch and matching love seat and they are super comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what I was getting myself into when I purchased a couch online especially a couch needing assembly. No idea if the couch would be comfortable but I figured Serta makes mattresses so how bad could it be; glad I took the chance as I love this sofa... the color is perfect, cushions are soft and comfortable and assembly was rather easy once I figured out that I was trying to screw the backs on to the wrong side. My only two complaints is that the couch is a little lower to the ground than I'd like and the pillows are cheap and not very soft but that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gerrick

customer_reviews.title: Like many have mentioned here
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap and functional couch for my apartment and this fit the bill well. Like many have mentioned here, the depth leaves something to be desired, it's not a deep couch. The cushions are a little firm but I actually like that. The couch sits decently low to the ground. Including throw pillows is a nice touch. The packaging was something to see, they really do jam a whole couch into a very heavy box. My one major complaint was that a part of the frame was damaged during transit and cracked some of the wood. It was just too much hassle to return it though and it's held up for many months now.
customer_reviews.author: BuildHobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! The furniture is very easy to assemble, finished in 20 minutes or less (just one person). I live in a mobile home, and the box wouldn't fit through the door, so I just opened the box on my porch and carried each part in separately...not a big deal. It fits perfectly in my living room, so much so that I also purchased the 73" & 78" couches. My boys were so surprised at how nice they look, how they are put together, and how comfortable they are. The seat is shorter than I'm used to but I can say that the couch makes me sit up straighter, which is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: hael40

customer_reviews.title: My only drawback was that it came unassembled in a big heavy box
customer_reviews.text: It was kinda easy to put together but the UPS guy just dropped it as our door as we weren't home and it was super heavy to get in the garage for storage before we could put it together. Other than that .....it's a small couch. Nothing special. You really need a different color accent pillow/pillows to jazz it up. It's pretty plain otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: W. D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fabric was stained when we opened the box!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a sofa and love seat. One box (couch) was fine, the other box we opened the fabric was stained with black on the arm rest, before we even took it out of the box! We decided to return both couches - you get what you pay for...see photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Trash
customer_reviews.text: This thing was almost $500. Install instructions appear to have been ran through Google translate so much that it hardly makes any sense. The front bottom chair leg didn't have a nut inside to accept the screw for the leg so its just sitting loose at the moment. I'm going to have to stop by the hardware store to get one on the way home. I wish I had just ordered the same thing from IKEA for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Perfect! Assemble it with your bare hands
customer_reviews.text: This couch is not only easy to assemble with your bare hands by yourself, it's a great couch! Mine has held up fine, seems very sturdy. I've had it for 2 months. It's really comfy. I'm five foot seven. It's small but is great for two people. Two people can sit on it and read books without being in each others face. You can sit with someone and put your legs on their lap or stay on your cushion. I love, love this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Karlina

customer_reviews.title: I would hate to have to take it apart again
customer_reviews.text: Back was too low, and the smell of the fabric was almost unbearable, I could taste it. I'm sure it was the repellent for water or animal scents, but it was nauseating. Unfortunately we have had it sitting in our garage for two weeks, In its original boxes, and just put it together, so I really have not looked into returning it. It took my husband about two hours to put it together and the box it came in was on a regular UPS truck so there was no way to put it back into that box. I would hate to have to take it apart again. A total hassle
customer_reviews.author: April L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Sofa arrived as promised.....on time. Easy assembly....took only about 30 minutes from unpacking to completion. Sofa sits VERY well....my wife and I can both lie on it together. Very comfortable. It also looks great too. I am VERY pleased with the purchase. It was a very good value for the money. I highly recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came on time, didn’t get the pillows
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks nice, leans forward pillow wise a bit. Realized after taking everything out that the throw pillows weren’t in it. Called amazon and their answer was to send the whole thing as a replacement take out the pillows then send back. Lady at amazon was very nice about it, but I’d already taken a day off to be home to get this, not doing it again for throw pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: perfect for apartment or rv. Fits rv slides.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a $1700 rv sofa with this. Yes, I have doggies. I bought 2 and my slide is a high level slide for Jayco front living. Waiting for components to hide my slide wires. Anywho, comfy the day I put together but twice as comfy in a month. Princess turned one slide with this sofa to her retreat. Cushions bounce back and no slobber stains. Serta needs to get with the rv program. Fit perfect and apparently I don't need the legs people gripe about as its on a high surface . Expensive rv couch didn't last nor comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sofa
customer_reviews.text: I love tis sofa! It definitely went above and beyond my expectations. It looks great and very comfortable. Not what you would expect for the price. It comes with pillows but I added my own for design. The instructions were super clear. I put it together myself in about 45 minutes. Make sure you wait the recommended 48 hours before you sit on it to make sure the cushions have a chance to expand. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It ripped when I was putting the cushion inside.
customer_reviews.text: Within the hour of unboxing this couch we boxed it back up and scheduled a return pick up. It's easy to assemble but the couch cushion ripped while I was putting the cushion inside of it. The seating is extremely awkward and uncomfortable, not to mention the box had no branding of Serta. I do not recommend this couch whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: - Good luck returning it
customer_reviews.text: - The quality is decent. - The couch is basically 2 halves connected by 3 bolts. The sides did not match up. - The cushions have still not expanded all the way (front and back of seat cushions still stick out); a week later. - Good luck returning it, if you are unsatisfied. Once you unpack the item, it is impossible to get it back into the box. Amazon's answer to this is to buy another box from them. They don't sell a big enough box.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the couch, hated the assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in a box that had dents in it, and the supposed vacuum sealed cushions were already exposed. One of the silica bags had been ripped, which should be mentioned because this is a potential hazard. The back seats did not properly "engage" so the back-side is slightly uneven. The middle legs slightly swivel even while tightly secured, although remain in place when the couch is standing. Stuffing the seat cushions took a lot of effort, and one of the zippers ripped from the fabric, but could potentially be sewn again. The material feels good, and the cushions are nice and puffy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Junk Junk Destoryed at factory
customer_reviews.text: what a piece of junk the holes dont line up period. one of the holes was way to big, you cant even try this thing out cause you cant put it together, been doing construction 15 years, and this product was ruined by someone at the factory drilling out the holes hes a mile off. legit 2 or 3 inches away from the line up.............. thank you serta for wasting everyones time the ups driver my time to get it 75 percent together...... and have to take it a part then now waste my time waiting for ups man.................. this product is disgusting save your money folks go get a real couch
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great price.  Looks nice.  But not exactly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Price was perfect. The couch, in the picture, doesn't look great, as it was just pit together and cushions still need to expand. I've added my own touches, as you can see. The issue, I have, is there is not much leg room, when sitting. Not very comfortable. And shipping was not what it said it would be...it arrived three days later than was originally supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Burt

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivers; Serta does not care
customer_reviews.text: The couch was priced VERY reasonably. It arrived within a few days, and required assembly--which was quite easy. However, Serta's customer service is TERRIBLE. The zipper on one of the cushion covers broke during assembly. I called Serta immediately, and they told me the soonest they could mail me a new cushion cover is 10 weeks! So, I have been sitting on half a couch for 7 weeks already--and waiting with diminishing certainty for the other cushion cover to arrive in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Good if you are a college student
customer_reviews.text: It's nice if you just want some furniture around the house. The cushion's velcro keeps unattaching, and cushions lose their shape very quickly. The sofa is a breeze to clean, however, and is pretty sturdy. I was able to put the whole thing together alone in about half an hour. Be prepared to fight with the cushions a little trying to get them in their covers initially.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: again not happy with product garbage
customer_reviews.text: another big disappointment from amazon couch looks normal but again big deception couch is very small made for children plus supposed to be 61" but is only 58" again cant send back box is gone never expected to be disappointed but this is getting to be a habit with amazon very frustrated what a piece of CRAP cant get cover for couch because couch is undersizeed
customer_reviews.author: robert w parlamento sr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate on this one...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a sofa for a small space that looks very chic, do not hesitate to buy this. I believe you typically get what you pay for, but not this time. This is an incredible price for a nice sofa. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice small love seat
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed. I wasnt expecting much for the cost of $300 and that it needed assembled but its pretty nice. Was easy to put together and is holding nicely. Not for kids to be jumping on but I have slept on it a few times and its holding up. It is shorter than show room furniture and will look like a toy if put with a large sofa. But great for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: laurie rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this couch for 8 months now. It is my main living room couch. I have taken many naps on this couch, and I use it daily as my primary seat. It looks just as great as the day that I bought it. I am considering buying another one for a different room. One of the best values that I have found on this site. One thing to note. I am 5'11" and my feet hang off the edge when I lay on it. I dont find this uncomfortable, but others might. Other than that, absolutely no complaints. It cleans easily with a vacuum. It hasnt lost any of the support, despite being used many times.
customer_reviews.author: KW81

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Much better quality and comfort than expected! Perfect for my Sunroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Decent couch, probably wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've had for about 4 months now. Decent sofa i guess. A little low to the ground and lightweight. I don't see it lasting through many moves... Love the material on the cushions! The back cushions velcro on and we all have issues sitting on the couch, the back cushions like un velcro and pull forward if that makes sense. Don't tey to assemble alone. I successfully did but it was a bit hard!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not worth the price. First the good. The fabric is very sturdy and the couch is easy to put together. The bad. I have had this item for about a month. The cushions are poor quality. The back cushions are fiber filled and offer no back support. The seat cushions are sturdy and firm at first, but they are already breaking down and losing support. I would not recommend this couch, I expected more from a Serta.
customer_reviews.author: George Wolfingbarger

customer_reviews.title: Not a great couch.
customer_reviews.text: This couch had such great reviews so we were a little disappointed when we finally put it together. It is a little low to the ground and looked a lot smaller than we thought it would. The major problem though, were the back pillows. They are attached with Velcro but the Velcro is always shifting and making Velcro noise every time you move. Also be aware that once you put it together it is difficult to return and you will be charged to return it.
customer_reviews.author: leb199

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again or recommend. Relatively easy to assemble, did not take long. Everytime someone sits on the couch velcro on the back cushions makes a loud noise. It has a shallow seating depth, and the seat cushions fall off and need to be pushed back multiple times a day. if everything I placed just right, not a bad place to sit, but way more trouble than it's worth. The only reason I didn't return it was that I thought it would be more trouble to take apart and figure out how to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Rugger88

customer_reviews.title: Nice, attractive little love seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice, attractive little love seat. Firm, but comfortable. One person can put it together easily (I am 5' 5" and 57, and did not have a problem, but the side pieces are a bit bulky so get help if you have back trouble). Just be sure to look inside the pieces for more pieces. Ingenious, compact design on one box!
customer_reviews.author: P. Cloninger

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and the bottom is comfy but there’s WAY too much padding on the back. It’s like someone is shoving you forward every time you sit down. I take the back cushions off to sit down, but it looks ghetto as hell and I didn’t pay good money for that! Going to literally have to tear apart the cushion inserts and remove stuffing but then the back cushions will look deflated. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Valerius

customer_reviews.title: The worst piece of furniture I have purchased in my life
customer_reviews.text: The worst piece of furniture I have purchased in my life. Poor construction, poor material, and poor design. Felt like it was leaning forward all the time. If Amazon had a -5 star I would have used it. I was so disappointed in the poor design. Should have returned it but got rid of the carton before it was used by my father at his assisted living home away from home.
customer_reviews.author: RLANTZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sofa! Serta really got this one right!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sofa! Incredible packaging and super easy assembly. I was worried it would be cheap and flimsy. It's a serta and it's quality. It's the perfect size for my townhome not too big not too small. It's comfy enough to nap on or even accidently fall asleep on overnight. Definitely a good buy for the price. And yes it ships in a box small enough to fit through your front door and packed well enough the most abusive package handler likely wont damage it. Serta really got this one right!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not what I imagined
customer_reviews.text: The sofa sits downhill. I have tried fluffing the seat cushions but it has not helped. The instructions said it could take several days for them to fully expand, however it ha been a week and no luck with that. I would not recommend this product. If we hadn't already disposed of the box I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The holes predrilled for the center legs were a good quarter inch off, causing a great deal of problems. The sofa would have been easily assembled but for this error. Unfortunately, this has not been the first time in our experience that predrilled holes do not match, proving that manufacturing needs to be more carefully quality controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Read to be informed but nice couch
customer_reviews.text: So for anyone who doesnt like things that come in boxes and you have to assemble this is one of them, but dont be fooled i put it together easily and its a very nice couch , it is small so for me being a bit bigger then average its nice to sit on and relax and i can lay on it and be comfy but i feel its better for my girlfriend since shes 5’6” Im 6’ and 230 to give u an idea but very comfy couch and look great seems durable we've had it for 2 months and no complaints
customer_reviews.author: nadia chavalier

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: This couch sucks. A lot of the pieces were difficult to put together because they were cut carelessly and didn’t fit together. I had to force a lot of the screws into holes in the wooden frame that just did not fit. Now, less than a month after receiving the couch it had started to break and some of the pieces are falling out of place and squeaking. Your money is better spent at a local furniture store. If I could return it and get my money back, I would
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Much more of a loveseat than a sofa, not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than I expected, this is small for a loveseat and definitely does NOT qualify as a sofa. It was easy to put together so there's that, and it doesn't look terrible or anything. The cushions are super firm, which you may or may not like...to me, the fact that I don't sink into it at all makes it feel weirdly precarious, like I'm going to topple off at any second. It would be ok in a pinch if it was inexpensive, but isn't worth anything near what's being charged for it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reha

customer_reviews.title: ... was about 4 ft by 4 ft which was nice and it is quite soft and has decent cushions ...
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was about 4 ft by 4 ft which was nice and it is quite soft and has decent cushions but some of the back pieces did not want to go all the way in like they were supposed to so I was forced to make them work as is. Also, it was supposed to come with two decorative pillows and it did not. I tried to contact seller before writing this review and there is no way for me to get ahold of the company to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but iffy construction.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2015 and still in use. Relatively easy to install but had a few flaws. The cushions remain deflated after 6 months of use and are difficult to fluff. The couch comes I two halves and relies on only a couple fixtures and a leg to join them in the the middle. A large friend sat heavily in the middle and it split in half. I had to reposition the middle leg to hold the weight and it’s still working.
customer_reviews.author: Omnipotus

customer_reviews.title: Great Loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 years old and I put this together by myself. It was just time consuming for me, as I had to wait on my son to get in from work to help me turn over after I installed the legs. Yes I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hatten

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve had this a week and it’s okay. It’s not that comfortable and I’m afraid it’s going to break. If you’re looking for something that looks nice in a room, this is good for that. Not much else. Wish I had spent a little more and got something that felt more solid and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Only owned for a couple hours. Holes don’t line up. Center legs don’t fit securely to the base and actually pivot back and forth. Probably why so many others say that it ends up breaking in the middle. And broken zippers. Cushions seem ok. But shoddy work making it. Will be returning. *** Returning something to Amazon is a joke! I just want my money back and they can’t have someone come pick it up even though they could have someone deliver the package. I just want my money back for a broken couch. Save yourself. Do not buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable couch! I thought it was a little bigger than it actually is! But other than that we ordered back in March and it is still going strong with two toddlers jumping on it and also a 5’10 250pound person sleeping on it for naps!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: it is a really nice love seat
customer_reviews.text: I was so confused when it came in a box but once pulled out and put together, it is a really nice love seat. The marzipan tan color is a little lighter than the picture shows but it's still a nice, soft neutral color. It does have a bit of a smell once it's out of the box, but that fades away pretty quickly. The material seems like it would be easy to clean but it was a bit harsh on my skin at first. It's a nice little love seat and fits perfectly into my tiny apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big guy (6' 3" and 250lbs) and it feels plenty comfortable, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised by the couch. I'm a big guy (6' 3" and 250lbs) and it feels plenty comfortable, looks nice, and seems sturdy. The shipping was great, and the whole thing being in one box was really convenient. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. It’s a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Although this sofa looks attractive, in real life it’s a cheap, flimsy, poorly constructed item. The pillows constantly fall out and the seating is too low for anyone to feel comfortable on. The only thing I like is that the questions are pretty soft and it cleans pretty easily. At first it looks like a great buy for your money, but in reality I’m going to end up having to buy a real life seat and get rid of this cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Milushka

customer_reviews.title: Small, rickety, smells like a chemical weapon factory, lumpy! BEWARE!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the smallest piece of garbage couch on the market, It has a STRONG chemical smell, much like I would imagine a chemical weapons factory must smell, the cushions are lumpy and it feels like it will break within the next week or so. I want to return it but it was so tightly packed into the box I had to tear the box to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ramey

customer_reviews.title: This loveseat is really comfortable and it is well made
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat is really comfortable and it is well made. Just a few steps to put it together and it was ready to go. I was hesitant to but a sofa online without trying it out, but I trusted in the Serta name and I was not disappointed at all. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheep option
customer_reviews.text: Definately a cheep option for a couch. Pros: Inexpensive Awesome packaging - whole couch in one box! Easy assembly Cons: Mine arrived with some kind of ink/dye across 2 of the cushions. The construction is cheep (you get what you pay for) and will likely not last more than a year. This may be a good option to furnish a playroom, low use room, staging. I would not recommend for someone's high traffic room.
customer_reviews.author: HaCo

customer_reviews.title: ....it's a $300 love seat
customer_reviews.text: Overall this isn't a bad loveseat. But let's be honest: it's a $300 piece of furniture. As others have stated it is small; low seat height and short depth. I've had worse. Assembly took about 15 minutes. It is more comfortable than it looks. Fabric is on the lower end of acceptable quality. After assembly give it a few days to expand to normal size as the padding comes vacuum sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly loses shape
customer_reviews.text: We've had this sofa in our living room for over a year and a half. We needed a couch that could be disassembled because of some tight corridors in our home's entrance. Because of how the cushions are situated, sitting on the couch feels like you're always being pushed off. The back cushions are held in place by velcro, but it's always coming loose and the bottom cushions are constantly slipping toward the front of the couch. We have a new routine: Lift the back cushion, push the bottom cushion back, reset the back cushion. Every. Single. Time. We're now trying to find a new sofa so we can throw this one in the bonfire.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Phillips

customer_reviews.title: No support and springs are very weak
customer_reviews.text: The couch is comfortable however you sink all the in it when you get close to the middle. It has no support. To be comfortable for your back you have to sit on the sides with your arm on the armrests. I think the springs or coils have to be stronger since they are very weak and I only weigh 150. But it is comfortable and not hard. The back cushions fall over a lot sorta like in the picture since they don’t have Velcro on the back like the bottom cushions. Other than these issues it would be a 5 star couch but I can only give it a 3 star review
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Are you a "doityourselfer?"
customer_reviews.text: This couch came in pieces. Something I am not accustom to. I am not a do it yourself kind of girl. And the smell...it has a very nasty smell. Not funky, but like machinery or some kind of spray. I am very unhappy with my purchase. I will be donating this couch in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered, for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered product. Just check all connection points bf assembly. I added a wood screw to one wood joint that loosened during shipping. Minor issue easily solved. The vacuumed packed seating cushions are much better than expected. Cushion fabric covers sized 10% too small resulting in firm seating and back support. Hoping will loosen a bit. An occasional use sofa at a reasonable price. Sized for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not a bad couch. The back pillows sag quickly but the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's not a bad couch. The back pillows sag quickly but the seat cushions have held up quit nicely over the last 5 months. Update: 2 years later: the back cushions are completely broken down. The bottom cushions won't stay on the couch very well. I bought this couch knowing it wasn't going to last. In the 2 yrs I have had this couch I had a 400 pound person sleeping on it everyday for a year. This is the reason why it's all broken down. If it hadn't been for her, I'm sure it would still be ok. The bottom cushions still have lots of spring into them, the back ones are dead.
customer_reviews.author: Vancouver Mom

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the kids, but it's RATED for 350 lbs so, being under that i figured I'd sit in it just to try it out. broke the back off in under 20 seconds. it's not for adults to sit in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable to sit on and to rise up from. People ages 17 to 70 had problems getting comfortable sitting on this VERY PLUSH sofa and the back pillows take up half the seating area. and loose shape easily if pressure is applied Also, trying to stand up after sitting is a workout in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good buy! The couches are very easy to assemble, finished in 20 minutes or less (just one person). The box wouldn't fit through the door, but I live in a mobile home, so the doors are smaller than a house. It fits perfectly in my living room, so much so that I also purchased the 73" couch and the 61" love seat. My boys were so surprised at how nice they look, how they are put together, and how comfortable they are. The seat is shorter than I'm used to but I can say that the couch makes me sit up straighter, which is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: hael40

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is average. It’s not super comfortable and I feel like I am sliding off since the cushions are at a downward angle. Maybe that will change with time (?) I purchased this since it was inexpensive and looks nice enough. My cat ruins all upholstery so I buy inexpensive sofas.
customer_reviews.author: KimS

customer_reviews.title: We were amazed with how this couch fit in a box
customer_reviews.text: We were amazed with how this couch fit in a box. The box was really really heavy, but the ups guy helped us move it inside the apartment. It took less then an hour to be put together, instructions were very clear. It's small, but we have a small space so it worked perfectly. It's very very comfy, the only complain I have is that the back cushions are too soft and they don't stay in place and sometimes get weird shaped. It's easy to get them back to normal but it gets annoying. Still, for the price of the couch, it's really good quality
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine in Rye Brown and got it in Marzipan... while the cushions are comfortable, they slide all around and come out often and easily. I also have mine on hard wood floors and it slides around A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable sofa. I'm a petite woman and don't own ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable sofa. I'm a petite woman and don't own any power tools. Yet I was able to carry this up three flights of stairs to my apartment and easily put it together by myself. I had to open the box and take the pieces upstairs one at a time. But it was easy to do, easy to assemble, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It appears to get dirty easily but I am going to throw out my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prematurely, did not really need it. I had to assembly it myself which was easier than I thought, but it seems light and flimsy and I have only sat in it twice in the 9 months I have had it. It appears to get dirty easily but I am going to throw out my old couch which is genuine leather but I have had it for 16 yrs. This will be my main couch now if I can get someone to move the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice couch for the price, the smell...not so much.
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the price although, it smells like old feet. Literally. I cannot be the only one. I am sure it’s the foam on the bottom cushions but oh my god! Smells like old unwashed feet! I shoved dryer sheets under the cushions but it’s barely helping. Hopefully it goes away. I must say, I cannot believe there was a couch-in-a-box! I wanted to give it five stars but knocked it down to 3 for the nauseating dirty feet smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: too soft! even if don't have back problems you'll ...
customer_reviews.text: too soft! even if don't have back problems you'll get it now! I thought of returning did not how and tolerating! But i only i could return even now! No pillows included ! When I called asked before purchase the call center representative said its included but I did not get any! I wish i could return it but no response! I feel like I lost money for crap
customer_reviews.author: lavi

customer_reviews.title: You will fall in love with this sofa!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love my sofa! It is so comfortable. Very nice and beautifully built! The pillows are nice and fluffy and I enjoy relaxing on it from a hard day's work!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Vii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size but not comfortable as a Loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the size but it is not comfortable at all if you are a skinny person, seat is very hard and material very rough, not soft at all like you would want from a loveseat or kick back and relax. Also watch for kids falling over backwards if you lean on the backrest .
customer_reviews.author: K.run

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I love this love seat. It's the perfect size for my bedroom, and it's very comfortable. I placed it to the bottom of my bed. I got the Rye Brown color 61'. It took 2 guys about 35 minutes to put it together. If I knew how to post a photo, I would have done so. I am 100% satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndibear

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and works great in my space but it’s firm and the cushions seem small because of the big back cushions. I feel like I’m gonna fall off when I lay down. It is a great bargain if you don’t lay down on it. If you do then pull off the back cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry T.

customer_reviews.title: This loveseat was just fine for what we needed it for (to put in ...
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat was just fine for what we needed it for (to put in a smallish space in an upstairs spare room). Given the price, I'd rate it as an excellent value. The shipping box is about 100 pounds and a little too bulky and heavy for one person to get up stairs. But not worries. Just unpack it and carry the pieces up individually. The assembly was not difficult and I put it together in about 30 minutes. I would like to point out that the color is more greenish (as pictured in the consumer reviews) as opposed to the light beige in the manufacturer's picture. Otherwise I would have given it five stars for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lookoutpi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy couch perfect for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on Monday and was delivered on Thursday. Simple assembly and perfect for my small space. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: We expected a little more comfort from this product, it is ok, hopefully it will stay this way, one cushion is smaller and softer than the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the fabric separating at the seam. I tried the number but it goes to global brands with the only option being to leave a message in the general mailbox. Message left and I am hopeful to change this review if they resolve.
customer_reviews.author: brent m corron

product_meta.title: Serta Copenhagen Sofa Couch for Two People, Pillowed Back Cushions and Rounded Arms, Durable Modern Upholstered Fabric, 73", Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Brown| Size:73" SofaBring functional style and affordable comfort to any living space with the Serta Copenhagen 73" Sofa. This two-person sofa is a great choice for compact living spaces like dorms and apartments, delivering premium coziness while making small spaces seem bigger. It features soft, rounded arms and tailored straight-back cushions that add a traditional style to your living room or den. The gray two-seat couch is constructed with reinforced hardwood materials, individually wrapped coils surrounded by high-density foam and poly-fibers, and pillowed back cushions that deliver both durability and supportive comfort. The Serta Copenhagen 73" Sofa ships in a single box and assembles with no tools needed. Use it as a stand-alone piece in a smaller room or pair it with another sofa, loveseat, or accent chair from the Copenhagen collection for a living room set.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars1,099 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
